result.title: Adversarial Retriever-Ranker model for Dense Retrieval
result.author: Hang Zhang, Yeyun Gong, Yelong Shen, Jiancheng Lv, Nan Duan, Weizhu Chen

result.title: Distill-VQ: Learning Retrieval Oriented Vector Quantization By Distilling Knowledge from Dense Embeddings
result.author: Shitao Xiao, Zheng Liu, Weihao Han, Jianjin Zhang, Defu Lian, Yeyun Gong, Qi Chen, Fan Yang, Hao Sun, Yingxia Shao, Denvy Deng, Qi Zhang, Xing Xie

result.title: CodeRetriever: Unimodal and Bimodal Contrastive Learning
result.author: Xiaonan Li, Yeyun Gong, Yelong Shen, Xipeng Qiu, Hang Zhang, Bolun Yao, Weizhen Qi, Daxin Jiang, Weizhu Chen, Nan Duan

result.value: This repo provides the code of AR2. In the paper, we propose a new *A*dversarial *R*etriever-*R*anker (AR2) framework, which constructs a unified minimax game for training the retriever and ranker models interactively.
This repo is still developing, feel free to report bugs and we will fix them ~
